ing: salt and ground black pepper to taste
des: "This is so quick and easy and goes down a real treat. Great with steak."
ins: Heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Cook and stir the asparagus in the hot oil until tender, about 5 minutes. Pour in the lemon juice, and season to taste with salt and pepper. Place the asparagus into a serving dish, and sprinkle with Parmesan cheese to serve.
